summary: UI Consolidation testing complete. All 10 frontend tests PASSED. Tab labels correctly renamed (Signals/Command/Analytics), Trading Bot moved to Command tab, AI Coach shortcut button works.
passed_tests: 3 tabs visible with correct labels: Signals, Command, Analytics
tab-trading shows 'Signals' label with lightning icon
tab-coach shows 'Command' label with target icon
tab-analytics shows 'Analytics' label with chart icon
Signals tab shows TradeSignals component only (no Trading Bot)
Command tab shows TradingBotPanel at the top (Autonomous/Confirmation/Paused modes)
Command tab shows AICommandPanel with 'Ask AI anything...' input
Command tab shows MarketIntelPanel on the right with Early Market Report
Header has 'AI Coach' shortcut button (not 'AI Assistant')
Clicking AI Coach shortcut button navigates from Signals to Command tab correctly
Analytics tab works with Learning Loop dashboard and Scanner
critical_code_review_comments: CommandCenterPage.js correctly defines 3 tabs with updated labels
AICoachTab.jsx correctly includes TradingBotPanel + AICommandPanel + MarketIntelPanel in grid layout
HeaderBar.jsx has AI Coach shortcut button with onNavigateToCoach callback
data-testid attributes properly implemented for all major components
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI consolidation complete. Tab structure: Signals (TradeSignals only), Command (Bot + AI Chat + Market Intel), Analytics (Learning Loop + Scanner). Key data-testids: tab-trading (Signals), tab-coach (Command), tab-analytics, trading-tab-content, ai-coach-tab-content, analytics-tab-content, ai-coach-shortcut-btn, trading-bot-panel, market-intel-panel, report-body, report-timeline.
